rev.diff:
Line 17: Line 17:
The software creates an exact duplicate of a disk including the copy protection of the disk, allowing you to copy game disks and make the software think it is the original disk. The program has CD burning built-in, not requiring any other program, unlike many other programs of this nature.
The software creates an exact duplicate of a disk including the copy protection of the disk, allowing you to copy game disks and make the software think it is the original disk. The program has CD burning built-in, not requiring any other program, unlike many other programs of this nature.
â
Perhaps it is a mark of this software's popularity and effectiveness in defeating [[Digital Rights Management|DRM]] schemes that versions of it are [[software blacklist|blacklisted]] by certain software manufacturers. The file type generally used by this application has the extension [[.ccd]]. The .ccd extension can be mounted with Virtual Drives such as [[Daemon Tools]], [[Alcohol 120%]] and [[Virtual CloneDrive]].
+
Perhaps it is a mark of this software's popularity and effectiveness in defeating [[Digital Rights Management|DRM]] schemes that versions of it are [[software blacklist|blacklisted]] by certain software manufacturers. The file type generally used by this application has the extension [[.ccd]]. The .ccd extension can be mounted with Virtual Drives such as [[Daemon Tools]] and [[Alcohol 120%]]
